name: titlist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person or team that has won a sports competition: She was the first three-time titlist in the history of the competition. The defending titlist was defeated in the first round.
More examplesFewer examplesThe defending titlist scored an easy win on the first day of the world championships.The fight features the return of former featherweight titlist Antonio Marquez.The European champion will now play the American titlist for the world championship.The four-time grand slam titlist has just announced his retirement from professional tennis.
